title: Connection Timeout in 2016 LUL
body:
Seriously tho wtf is this, I started getting it a month ago and whatever I do it just comes back. 
1.Disabled IP Helper in services.
2.Disabled Firewall
3.Flushed DNS
4.Installed latest windows updates
5.Run in Windows 8 compatibility mode
6.Reset router
7.Reinstalled League
8.Reinstalled Windows 10(I also tried Windows 7 and 8; it also happens there)
9.Restarted Computer
10.Run as Administrator

replies.body:
It seems this could be caused by connections issues in reaching the server. If your client can't connect to PvP.net it can cause some functions not to work or close the client entirely. Looks like you've already worked through some good basic steps, so I would suggest looking at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see what steps you haven't tried yet. 

Let me know if this issue persists.
